channel.title: How can i make a mage spell that you need a item to use?
channel.description: how can i make a spell for magic that you need an item to use the spell .. such as zammy flames sara strike or claws of guthix ? (you need the staffs in your inventory)

item.title: How can i make a mage spell that you need a item to use?
item.dc:creator: @udluv2 udluv2
item.description:
@udluv2 wrote:

just copy and past the code from one like if item id 152 = true then blah blah blah and so on. Its quite easy.[br][size=1]Posted on: January 07, 2007, 05:08:08 PM[/size][hr][quote=“killa12345 [br”][size=1]Posted on: January 07, 2007, 12:53:45 AM[/size][hr]hahahahahah i found out how to do it myself… it was actually pretty easy =) if theres no tuts on it i mite post it[/quote]

Mabey you should because some1 might be looking for this and it could help them.

Read full topic

item.title: How can i make a mage spell that you need a item to use?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Not easy, I highly doubt there are any tutorials for this. I suggest you learn to better understand the basis of java, and private-server engines, and I suggest you look at some tuts. I doubt this is possible, but it might be as easy as the && playerRights = thing, such as && playerequipment slot = =, or something, you never know. I can’t really help you out on this one.
